item.title: Stats joke
item.description: Correlation implies causation? A: I used to think correlation implied causation. Then I took a statistics class. Now I don’t. B: Sounds like the class helped. A: Well, maybe.
item.content:
Correlation implies causation?

A: I used to think correlation implied causation. Then I took a statistics class. Now I don’t.

B: Sounds like the class helped.

A: Well, maybe.
